title: ReceptionistPunk
body: << ChangeIcon Receptionist >> Hello, can I help you ?

title: NothingToDo
body: << ChangeIcon Player >> I don't know what to do with it

title: PunkHead
body:
<< ChangeIcon Player >> The programmer couldn't have chosen something more elegant ?
And where I change my dress?

title: ReceptionistNormal
body:
<<  MakeDialogAction DisableWall One >> 
<< ChangeIcon Receptionist >> Hi A, where are you going ?
<< ChangeIcon Player >> Ehm, ohm, beyond, I saw a three-headed monkey
<< ChangeIcon Receptionist >> Nice quote but nobody believes you
Please do not continue onthis way

title: ChangeLook
body: << ChangeIcon Player >> What I have to do to be in this game !

title: ReceptionistStop
body: << ChangeIcon Receptionist >> Stop! You know you can't go on.

title: Monkey
body:
<< ChangeIcon Player >> Hi, where did you put the other two heads ?
<< ChangeIcon Monkey >> I'm afraid you have the wrong game

title: LetsSmile
body: <<  MakeDialogAction Smile >>   << ChangeIcon Player >> Come on, life is beautiful !!!
